page.title: 16Children's Games in Alton(2)
page.content: We used to do handstands against the wall,Moon,Star,Thunder,Lightning, were the names of handstands. We play British Bulldog on the playground.A person in the middle calls " British Bulldog 1_2_3"and the others try to run from one side to the other without being caught. In Red Rover there are two lines of children holding hands,facing one another,some distance apart.You say"Red Rover"twice and pick someone from the other line.They try to run and break through your line,but have to join it if they fail. In 40_40 one player counts while the others hide.Then he searches and calls"40_40 seen"and the person's name and where he's seen them.The others try to touch the base and say "40_40 in."
